subject: Follow-up: Q4 Report Request
preview: Hi John, Just wanted to follow up on our meeting yesterday. Can you send over the Q4 report when you get a chance? Thanks, Sarah

body.text:
Hi John,

Just wanted to follow up on our meeting yesterday. Can you send over the Q4 report when you get a chance?

Thanks,
Sarah
